title: My Art Journey
script:
Anushka: Namaste dosto! Aaj main aap sabse apni kala yatra ke bare mein baat karna chahti hoon.
Anushka: Yaad hai bachpan mein, har diwaar par crayons se painting banaati thi? Maa daantti thi, lekin dil toh wahin atka tha.
Anushka: Phir school hua, classes hui, kuch seekha, kuch khud dhunda. Watercolors se lekar oils tak, har rang se rishta joda.
Anushka: Kayi baar laga, shayad yeh mere bas ka nahi. Lekin phir kisi ne kaha, 'Anushka, tumhara dil jhooth nahi bolta'.
Anushka: Tab se, har brushstroke ek kahani hai, har canvas ek naya safar.
Anushka: Ab sochti hoon, woh crayons wali chhoti si ladki kitni door aa gayi.
Anushka: Meri art journey abhi shuru hui hai, aur main excited hoon ki aage kya hoga! Shukriya!
